headline: Assurant Inc (AIZ) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Growth Amidst Strategic Investments
summary: Assurant Inc (AIZ) reports robust double-digit growth in adjusted EBITDA and EPS, while navigating strategic investments and market challenges.

content.title: Assurant Inc (AIZ) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Growth Amidst Strategic Investments
content.summary: Assurant Inc (AIZ) reports robust double-digit growth in adjusted EBITDA and EPS, while navigating strategic investments and market challenges.

headline: Is Assurant (AIZ) Using Buybacks and Home Warranties to Quietly Redefine Its Growth Playbook?
summary: In February 2026, Assurant, Inc. reported fourth-quarter 2025 revenue of US$3,350.4 million and net income of US$225.2 million, capping a year in which full-year revenue reached US$12,814.3 million and net income was US$872.7 million. Alongside these results, Assurant completed a US$579.88 million share repurchase program and announced a long-term rollout of Assurant Home Warranty with Compass International Holdings, extending its protection offerings across major real estate brands. We’ll...
